snippet: The team that made “Zero Dark Thirty” — Kathryn Bigelow, Mark Boal and Megan Ellison — are competing with a Fox Searchlight project.
abstract: The team that made “Zero Dark Thirty” — Kathryn Bigelow, Mark Boal and Megan Ellison — are competing with a Fox Searchlight project.

headline.main: Bowe Bergdahl the Subject of Rival Films
headline.print_headline: Bergdahl Is the Subject of Rival Films
